titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide a refundable tax credit to taxpayers who provide reductions in rent to their tenants under State rental reduction programs, and for other purposes.
Renters Tax Credit Act of 2021
Renters Tax Credit Act of 2021

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary:
Renters Tax Credit Act of 2021
This bill allows owners of rental buildings who provide reductions in rent to their low-income tenants a refundable tax credit for a specified percentage of the difference between market rent and 30% of the monthly family income of such tenants. The bill allocates credit amounts to states for distribution to participating taxpayers.
